title: Forightend
author: Forightend
content: Hi,I am looking for 0.0035 Btc loan and will repay 0.0037 withen a week, i have to attend Interview Held in abhu dhabi with Wizz Air at Inn Hotel Abhu Dhabi at 09/05/2023, i have to buy a suite and use some money for travling from Sharjah to Abhu Dhabi about 180km, i will pay back loan at 14/05/2023 as i get able to have half salery in advance.ready to keep my personal account of facebook or Instagrame insecurity,Thank you

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: Forightend on May 06, 2023, 11:50:54 AMHi,I am looking for 0.0035 Btc loan and will repay 0.0037 withen a week, i have to attend Interview Held in abhu dhabi with Wizz Air at Inn Hotel Abhu Dhabi at 09/05/2023, i have to buy a suite and use some money for travling from Sharjah to Abhu Dhabi about 180km, i will pay back loan at 14/05/2023 as i get able to have half salery in advance.ready to keep my personal account of facebook or Instagrame insecurity,Thank you I'm sorry to hear about your insecurity.  Be sure to post some happy snaps of your weekend away.  Lafu also misspells travling  - as does brainless - coincidence?  ( JustReadThis also misspells travling and is banned. )

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Forightend on May 06, 2023, 11:50:54 AMHi,I am looking for 0.0035 Btc loan and will repay 0.0037 withen a week, i have to attend Interview Held in abhu dhabi with Wizz Air at Inn Hotel Abhu Dhabi at 09/05/2023, i have to buy a suite and use some money for travling from Sharjah to Abhu Dhabi about 180km, i will pay back loan at 14/05/2023 as i get able to have half salery in advance.That's just $101.02, it won't even be enough for a suit.Don't you have Family, Relatives or friends to ask this kind of money where they will even lend it to you without collateral or expecting you to pay interest? After all, you will repay it to them within a week, right?

comments.author: Forightend
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 06, 2023, 11:50:10 PMQuote from: Forightend on May 06, 2023, 11:50:54 AMHi,I am looking for 0.0035 Btc loan and will repay 0.0037 withen a week, i have to attend Interview Held in abhu dhabi with Wizz Air at Inn Hotel Abhu Dhabi at 09/05/2023, i have to buy a suite and use some money for travling from Sharjah to Abhu Dhabi about 180km, i will pay back loan at 14/05/2023 as i get able to have half salery in advance.That's just $101.02, it won't even be enough for a suit.Don't you have Family, Relatives or friends to ask this kind of money where they will even lend it to you without collateral or expecting you to pay interest? After all, you will repay it to them within a week, right? bought with 170 Aed A suite and with 40 Aed Shoes And a shirt with 19 Aed got loan from the security guy in our building     wish me luck its going to be my 3rd interview for cabin crew position, i have family who looking forward to have money from me

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: When you said suite, were you meaning suit?
